remarks: The successor of a decimal integer (no carry).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
numnncl.1 $e |- T e. NN0 $.
numnncl.2 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
numcl.2 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
numsuc.4 $e |- ( B + 1 ) = C $.
numsuc.5 $e |- N = ( ( T x. A ) + B ) $.
numsuc $p |- ( N + 1 ) = ( ( T x. A ) + C ) $.
